testdx:force:apex:run.description:
By default, runs all Apex tests in the orgâ€™s namespace.

  To run specific test classes, specify class names or suite names, or set a --testlevel value.

  To run specific test methods, use --tests.

  Generates html report.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

classnames.name: classnames
classnames.description: comma-separated list of Apex test class names to run

suitenames.name: suitenames
suitenames.description: comma-separated list of Apex test suite names to run

tests.name: tests
tests.description: comma-separated list of Apex test class names or IDs and, if applicable, test methods to run

outputdir.name: outputdir
outputdir.description: directory to store test run files

wait.name: wait
wait.description: the streaming client socket timeout (in minutes)

precompilewait.name: precompilewait
precompilewait.description: how long to wait (in minutes) for Apex pre-compilation

synchronous.name: synchronous
synchronous.description: run tests from a single class synchronously

resultformat.name: resultformat
resultformat.description: result format emitted to stdout; --json flag overrides this parameter
